alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 03 at 2:58AM PDT until November 03 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures from 29F to 35F will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio, Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest and Mountains of San Benito and Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park. * WHEN...Through 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. Populations sensitive to cold temperatures such as the elderly should take proper precautions, including please do not leave pets outdoors overnight in cold temperatures. Expect near freezing to slightly sub-freezing temperatures through just after sunrise Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
